hotels.title: Jamaica Villa-Only Resort with Peaceful Private Beach
hotels.description: Stay just outside Jamaica's sun-kissed Port Antonio at The Trident Hotel, a villa-only property on the cusp of the Caribbean Sea, where it's all about relaxing and embracing a laidback beach lifestyle. Dine at any of the three onsite restaurants, including Mike's Supper Club, a vibrant cabaret lounge where a Jamaican-fusion menu is accompanied by live music. There's a private beach where you can practice stand-up paddleboarding or go snorkelling, while The Trident Spa offers seaside massages and other luxurious treatments for blissful moments of relaxation. Port Antonio celebrates the authentic side of Jamaica; here, you'll find markets, street vendors and Georgian architecture along with friendly locals, stunning waterfalls and mysterious caves. Retire to your spacious accommodation and enjoy ocean views from every room, or visit the famous Errol Flynn Marina and its nearby restaurants, boutiques and craft markets.
